class.name: DeepRayCast3DResult
class.brief_description: Represents a single raycast collision result detected by DeepRayCast3D.
class.description: This class stores detailed information about a single collision hit returned by a DeepRayCast3D node. It contains data such as the collider object, its ID, the surface normal, hit position, face index, RID, and shape index.
class.tutorials: # Example: Using DeepRayCast3DResult in GDScript func _on_deep_raycast_collided(results): for result in results: print("Collider:", result.get_collider()) print("Position:", result.get_position()) print("Normal:", result.get_normal()) print("Face Index:", result.get_face_index()) print("RID:", result.get_rid()) print("Shape:", result.get_shape())

method.name: get_collider
method.description: Returns the PhysicsBody3D that was hit by the raycast.

method.name: get_collider_id
method.description: Returns the unique instance ID of the collider that was hit.

method.name: get_face_index
method.description: Returns the index of the face that was hit on the collider mesh, if applicable.

method.name: get_normal
method.description: Returns the surface normal vector at the collision point.

method.name: get_position
method.description: Returns the world position of the collision point.

method.name: get_rid
method.description: Returns the RID (Resource ID) of the physics object that was hit.

method.name: get_shape
method.description: Returns the index of the collider shape that was hit.

method.name: set_collider
method.description: Sets the collider object for this result.

method.name: set_collider_id
method.description: Sets the collider's unique instance ID for this result.

method.name: set_face_index
method.description: Sets the mesh face index that was hit.

method.name: set_normal
method.description: Sets the collision surface normal for this result.

method.name: set_position
method.description: Sets the collision point in world coordinates.

method.name: set_rid
method.description: Sets the RID (Resource ID) for this result.

method.name: set_shape
method.description: Sets the collider shape index that was hit.
